message: Very nice presentation recording and slides. The driver is very interesting, pretty clean and truly well thought. One thing to note though is that we're back to separating storage concerns from model aspects. What you see is another mapper like ORMs, except the storage happens to be not exactly relational.
name: 10gen - MongoDB Presentations - Webinar: What's new in the .NET Driver
caption: www.10gen.com
description: Recent releases of the .NET driver have added lots of cool new features. In this webinar we will highlight some of the most important ones. We will begin by discussing serialization. We will describe how serialization is normally handled, and how you can customize the process when you need to, inclu...
